nodes.text: A promotional pin was sent to real-world journalists in September 2014 as part of the HoloNet News promotion for the then-upcoming animated television series Star Wars Rebels. The pin was of the emblem for the Imperial Press Corps, an in-universe organization of journalists for the Galactic Empire. Included with the pin was a card featuring a canonical communiqué issued by HNN Bureau Chief Eris Harro and Minister of Information Pollux Hax, with the flip side of the card giving information on the premiere of Star Wars Rebels.
